skills.label: Design an Azure Data solution
items: May include but is not limited to: choose the correct data storage solution to meet the technical and business requirements, calculate the storage capacity of data, recommend tier based on data requirements, decide partition distribution type

skills.label: Design Azure Cloud data warehouses
items: May include but is not limited to: design the data schema, design for scale

skills.label: Design No-SQL Databases
items: May include but is not limited to: design data distribution and partitions, design a cosmosdb solution, select the database platform, model data storage based on use cases, select storage types

skills.label: Design Azure SQL Database
items: May include but is not limited to: design for scale, design data load technologies, design solution architecture

skills.label: Design hybrid data scenarios
items: May include but is not limited to: design hybrid solution, design data replication and synchronization

skills.label: Design batch processing solutions
items: May include but is not limited to: design batch processing solutions using spark, design batch processing solutions using azure databricks

skills.label: Design big data real-time processing solutions
items: May include but is not limited to: design for real-time processing, design for lambda architecture, design and provision compute resources

skills.label: Design integration solutions
items: May include but is not limited to: design cloud analytic solutions, design data processing activities, design data migration

label: Design for Data Security and Compliance (15-20%)

skills.label: Design source data access security
items: May include but is not limited to: design network security, choose the appropriate authentication mechanism, choose the appropriate authorization mechanism

skills.label: Design security for data policies and standards
items: May include but is not limited to: design for data encryption, design for data auditing, design for data privacy

skills.label: Design a data retention policy
items: May include but is not limited to: design a backup and recovery policy, evaluate business requirements for data retention

label: Design for High Availability and Disaster Recovery (20-25%)

skills.label: Design for Optimization
items: May include but is not limited to: design for optimized hive processing, design for optimized data lake, design for optimized spark processing, design for optimized azure stream analytics, design for optimized data warehouse, design for optimized sql db, plan for the data life cycle

skills.label: Design and implement a disaster recovery strategy
items: May include but is not limited to: design a backup and recovery policy, design an online disaster recovery strategy, design for multi-region availability, plan for backup and restore

skills.label: Design for High Availability
items: May include but is not limited to: design for multi-region availability, design for read scale, design for multi-master writes
